rule_applied: resolving doubts in favor of the applicant

application_details: applicant fell short of 1,095 days of physical presence (only 689 days)
decision_reasoning: residency means physical presence in Canada, aligning with Re Pourghasemi's purposive interpretation of the statute
procedure_followed: Appeal to Federal Court under subsection 14(5) of the Citizenship Act. Court reviewed residency requirement interpretations and standard of review.
result_of_case: Appeal dismissed; residency interpreted as physical presence; no order for costs.

Different Crime.Crime Name: Serious criminality under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
application_details: Respondent was sentenced to three years, with credit for 30 months of pre-sentence custody
decision_reasoning: Pre-sentence custody forms part of the term of imprisonment under IRPA
conclusion_outcome: IAD decision set aside; case referred for redetermination; certified question confirmed.
cause_of_action: Respondent pleaded guilty to cocaine trafficking
procedure_followed: Judicial review determined the IAD erred in excluding pre-sentence custody from the term of imprisonment

decision_reasoning: motions to oppose seizures are incidental to judgment execution

evidence_assessment: Dutch conviction for aiding the enemy

material_misrepresentation: concealed his involvement with NSB, WA, and Landwacht
provided misleading information on immigration forms and during his citizenship application

evidence_assessment: Luitjens concealed his membership in Nazi organizations and a criminal conviction in the Netherlands
decision_reasoning: Luitjens obtained citizenship through false representation or knowingly concealing material circumstances
procedure_followed: The case was referred to the Federal Court under Section 9 of the Citizenship Act. The court reviewed evidence, including Luitjens' testimony and historical documents.
result_of_case: Jacob Luitjens' Canadian citizenship was revoked due to false representation and concealment of material information.

evidence_assessment: involvement in wartime activities aiding the enemy
procedural_fairness: The Secretary of State initiated proceedings under the Citizenship Act
complicity_in_crimes: involvement in Nazi organizations and war crimes
